detectors.description:
DMC_DAYPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMC_DAYPool.sol#841-856) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(duration) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMC_DAYPool.sol#846)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMC_DAYPool.sol#849)
detectors.markdown:
[DMC_DAYPool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMC_DAYPool.sol#L841-L856) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-[rewardRate = reward.div(duration)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMC_DAYPool.sol#L846)
	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/DMC_DAYPool.sol#L849)
